resources.string: Since NotifyWho is ad-free, you can only add two contacts with one vibration pattern. By supporting the developer with 0.99$, you can add unlimited contacts & unlimited vibrations! You can also create your own vibrations! Click to purchase premium.
You have to set \"Notification Tone\" and \"Vibrate\" to silent/None in WhatsApp settings.
Click on \"Notification tone\", select \"None\".\nThen click on \"Vibrate\", select \"Off\"
Please enable \"[NotifyWho] Custom Ringtones Service\" to allow this app to work.
Almost There!\n\n Press the plus button on the bottom right to assign custom tones & vibrations to a contact."
Warning: Service was not enabled! Expect unexpected behavior! Restart app to fix…
This App was developed by Travis Ziegler. Contact travisjayday@gmail.com for feedback or recommendations.

This app replaces your Whatsapp notification manager. Whenever you receive a Whatsapp from someone, this app checks whether you have defined a custom notification sound for that someone. If you have, it will play that sound; if not, it will play the system default sound. For this app to work properly, you must grant it write / contact permission, enable the Notification Service and disable Whatsapp Notification sounds. Re-install if not working. Contact travisjayday@gmail.com for more help.
Upon getting messages from contacts to whom you have not assigned a custom notification tone, the default notification tone will play.
NotifyWho replaces WhatsApp\'s notification tones and needs access to contacts to assign and save custom tones
NotifyWho augments your WhatsApp notifications and needs special permissions.
Need to read and manage notifications
Notification Service not enabled…Please enable it for NotifyWho to work!
App will not work. No Read Contact Permission. Restart App and enable Permissions!
You don\'t want double notification sounds, so you have to disable WhatsApp Notification sounds.
Please set your WhatsApp notification tone to None.
If you did not disable WhatsApp\'s sounds, you should do so later. Otherwise, you are all set.
You can now start to assign custom ringtones to contacts of your choice.
Click to contact travisjayday@gmail.com to report bugs and leave feedback.
Default tones & vibrations play whenever you get a message from someone outside of your custom notifications list. Click below to set defaults.
No vibrations will play since battery saver mode is enabled. Please disabled it!
Failed to parse given vibration pattern! Try retyping it to fix it!
Duplicate vibration pattern exists. Try re-naming it. [Read/Write error].
You\'ve already added two custom contacts. Please support the developer and consider buying premium for $0.99 to add unlimited contacts and set custom vibrations!
You\'ve already set one custom vibration. Please support the developer and consider buying premium for $0.99 to add unlimited contacts and set custom vibrations!
Couldn\'t complete action because you are not premium!
